‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

Best. Riding. Pants. Ever.

Best bang for buck!! You look cool, you feel cool, and they protect you - and it allows you to sit comfortably on your bike due to the thoughtful elastic placement. The pockets moved further down leg are an especially nice touch - nothing poking you from the side anymore!

Lastly, their customer service is fantastic - well run small business with great products that deserves our support!

1/27/22

Great Pants! Very comfortable and great fit with and without the armor. I'm a 34/34 in 501's and ordered a size 32. Perfect! These can be worn over boots or inside of boots. Highly recommended.
